main event: A bright star-sized object was observed traveling at high speed in an erratic course over Dallas, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed making wide circles around the airport,The sighting was recorded on 31 July 54,The duration of the observation is unknown,There were indications that it could be a balloon or aircraft but insufficient data for firm analysis,An attorney named Talbot was involved in the report.
witness description: Civilians including an attorney and his friend
